root.speaker: Sam
root.text: Yo, wanna hit the park after school? I found this sick spot by the creek. Also I have Doritos.

choices.internal_monologue: (The creek is cold and the Doritos are stale. This is the best day of your month. You won't know this until you're 32.)

choices.text: Can't, gotta study for the SATs. Next time?
choices.internal_monologue: (There will be 14 more 'next times.' Then there won't be.)

choices.text: I have debate practice. But maybe after?
choices.internal_monologue: (Debate practice ends at 6. By then Sam will be home. You'll text 'sorry' with a grimace emoji. Sam will send back 'all good'. It's not.)

sam_park.speaker: Sam
sam_park.text: Dude, check it out. You can see the whole town from up here. Pretty mid, honestly. I can't wait to get out of here.

choices.text: Same. I'm gonna go somewhere big. Big city, big job, the whole thing.
choices.internal_monologue: (Sam nods. Sam is not going to the big city. You both know this and neither says it.)

choices.text: I dunno. This is kinda nice, actually. Just... sitting here.
choices.internal_monologue: (This IS nice. File this memory somewhere safe. You'll need it later.)

sam_rejected.speaker: Sam
sam_rejected.text: Yeah... sure. Next time. You've been saying that a lot lately.

choices.text: I know. I'm sorry. After the SATs, I promise.
choices.internal_monologue: (The SATs are in 3 months. After that it'll be college apps. After that it'll be college. The goalposts move forever.)

choices.text: Come on, don't be like that. You know this stuff matters.
choices.internal_monologue: (Sam's face does the thing where they smile but their eyes don't. You pretend not to notice.)

sam_maybe.speaker: Sam
sam_maybe.text: Yeah, sure. Text me when you're done. Or whatever.

choices.text: I will! For real this time.

sam_future_talk.speaker: Sam
sam_future_talk.text: Yeah, you will. You're like... the most driven person I know. It's honestly kinda scary sometimes. Like, do you ever just... chill?

choices.text: I'm chilling right now! This is me chilling!
choices.internal_monologue: (You are mentally reviewing your extracurricular list while saying this.)

choices.text: I'll chill when I've made it. Then I can relax.
choices.internal_monologue: (This is the biggest lie anyone has ever told themselves. It has been told by every person who has ever 'made it.' None of them relaxed.)

sam_nice_moment.speaker: Sam
sam_nice_moment.text: Right? Sometimes I think the whole 'get into a good school, get a good job' thing is just... a game everyone plays. Like, who even decided this was the game?

choices.internal_monologue: (Sam just described the thesis of this entire game. Sam has no idea. You have no idea. The player might.)

choices.text: Careful, you're starting to sound like a philosophy major.
choices.internal_monologue: (Both of you laugh. It's the kind of laugh where you're deflecting because the truth is too big to sit with right now.)
